meanings.sent1: The puppy's neotenous features made it look adorable even as it grew older.
meanings.sent2: The neotenous appearance of the kitten made it hard to believe it was already a year old.
meanings.sent3: The neotenous teddy bear seemed to never age, always looking cuddly and cute.
meanings.sent4: Her neotenous smile lit up the room, making everyone feel young at heart.
meanings.sent5: The neotenous charm of the baby elephant captured the hearts of all who saw it.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics of a young or immature organism.
meanings.sent1: The neotenous behavior of the ducklings was endearing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The neotenous features of the tadpole indicated its early stage of development.
meanings.sent3: The neotenous plant seemed to shy away from the sunlight, like a young sprout.
meanings.sent4: Her neotenous voice sounded like that of a child, innocent and pure.
meanings.sent5: The neotenous energy of the puppies was contagious, bringing joy to all around.
